issue.title: [Dev][Archery][Crossbow] Comment bot only waits for task if link is not available
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-18068](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18068). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
With the change introduced on ARROW-18048 (<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14412>) we are waiting the wait time for each task that is triggered on the comment on the PR.

The problem is that if we execute a group of tasks this will wait the defined amount of seconds (60 as default) for each one of the tasks on the group.
